entrance.name: entrance
entrance.description: You're in Battell entrance. You want to have a good time. Where would you like to go?

exits.description: You go up the staircase to the second floor.
It smells like burnt popcorn over there. Follow the smell?

basement.name: basement
basement.description: Yikes, you just inhaled so much mold. This was a mistake.

b2s.name: b2s
b2s.description: You're in B2S... This seems pretty lame. Let's go somewhere else.

exits.description: You go back to the stairs.
You see a strange light over in center.

b2c.name: b2c
b2c.description: You're in B2C... This seems pretty lame. Let's go somewhere else.

exits.description: You go back to the stairs.
Center is boring. You go back to south.
Center is boring. You feel good vibes coming from north. You check it out.

b2n.name: b2n
b2n.description: Wow, you're in B2N. his place is full of amazing people. Congrats, you've found the party!

exits.description: You don't want to have a good time. You go back down the stairs
North is too fun. You wan't to leave for some reason.

College Street.name: College Street
College Street.description: You're outside! It's -50 degrees celcius. You instantly die from cold shock.

kitchen.name: kitchen
kitchen.description: Yikes, there's a mouse here. Battell must be full of mice.

exits.description: You go back down the stairs.
You hear some music and laughs. Sounds like a good time.
It's dead silent over there. Spooky stuff.
You see a PubSafe officer walking around.
You smell something weird and follow the smell.
It's hot in here. You want to leave.
